author: Christine Fisher
title: Facebook’s new Messenger hub shares tips for staying connected virtually
description: Today, Facebook launched a new " Messenger Coronavirus Community Hub," which so far basically just explains how people, communities and businesses can use Messenger to stay connected during the coronavirus pandemic. If you already use Messenger, this isn't go…
content: The hub combines some of Facebook's other efforts -- like initiatives to fight the spread of misinformation and connect developers with organizations like the World Health Organization (WHO), Centers for Disease Control and UNICEF. It also warns users against… [+453 chars]
